Climate change is cited as a factor intensifying these deadly weather events.

The philanthropist has been a steadfast presence for her girls, balancing their needs with her own grief. Bryant expressed immense pride in Natalia's resilience and maturity, highlighting her role as a supportive big sister and daughter.

title: Megan Thee Stallion gives Thanksgiving surprise to boyfriend Klay Thompson in heartfelt video
description: Megan Thee Stallion impressed Klay Thompson and his family by cooking a full Thanksgiving feast, showcasing her culinary skills and affection. Her efforts were met with high praise, including from Klay's father, Mychal Thompson, who suggested she could open her own restaurant. This intimate holiday moment offered fans a sweet glimpse into the couple's growing relationship.

title: Gmail storage hack: How to keep inbox running smoothly - Check details
description: Running out of Gmail storage is a common issue, often exacerbated by connected Google services like Drive and Photos.  This article outlines practical steps to clear space, including emptying trash, deleting large attachments, and utilizing the Google One Storage Manager.  Adopting smart habits can prevent future storage problems and maintain optimal performance.

title: Thousands of Amazon employees send open letter to CEO; question layoffs
description: Over 1,000 Amazon employees have signed an open letter warning of dire consequences from the company's rapid AI development. They argue Amazon is sacrificing climate goals and its human workforce for AI dominance, citing increased emissions, water consumption for data centers, and job displacement. The workers demand ethical AI practices, including clean energy use and employee involvement in AI decisions.

title: ‘Mobile not allowed in school’: Class 8 student, national level skater jumps from MP school
description: A 14-year-old national-level skater in Ujjain tragically jumped from his school's third floor after being summoned to discuss his mobile phone use. The boy, who sustained severe injuries including spinal fractures, reportedly feared his parents' reaction. He was preparing for a national tournament. An investigation is underway.
